Open WIFI compatibility mode will improve compatibilty of TV to some routers, and have the opportunity to solve WIFI problem. Need to restart TV to take effect.
Open WIFI compatibility mode will improve compatibilty of box to some routers, and have the opportunity to solve WIFI problem. Need to restart box to take effect.
